name: Non-Stop Pop-Up
description:
Submission for Mini-Jam 100, the theme is "Overload" and the limitation is "Chaos is Everything".

In this retro-style shoot-em-up you'll have to dodge and defeat enemies in order to beat all of the stages. 
There's a twist however, you'll have to keep an eye out for spam pop-ups and close them as fast as you can while you play. If too many are open at the same time or your health drops to 0 it's game over. Some special pop-ups can affect you in positive or negative ways.

Jorge Pons Asensio - Game design and programming - https://twitter.com/TCLDrawings
Rodrigo Gil Manrique - Visual design and pixel art - https://twitter.com/rgilm_

Controls:
WASD - Move
Shift - Move slowly
Left Click - Close or accept pop-ups
